<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Align Ki](/Feats.aspx?ID=1740) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

**Trigger**
You Cast a Spell that has the [monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112) trait.

</column>

---

The power of your ki soothes your wounds and energizes you for battle. You regain Hit Points equal to your level plus your Wisdom modifier.
name: Align Ki
